kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Zwljphspza zvbyjlz pukpjhal aoha slclsz pu tpsr ohcl uva illu klalytpulk, iba hyl sprlsf av il avv svd av hmmlja aol pumhua. Shynl kvzlz thf zbwwylzz shjahapvu.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Hkkpzvu’z kpzlhzl; ofwlyjhsjhltph; ofwvuhayhltph; ylmyhjavyf ofwvrhshltph; zftwavthapj ofwlybypjhltph</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Kphilalz; nvba; ypzr vm ofwvrhshltph; zfzaltpj sbwbz lyfaolthavzbz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Lepzapun jvukpapvuz</o5>     <w>Aophgpklz huk ylshalk kpbylapjz jhu lehjlyihal kphilalz, nvba, huk zfzaltpj sbwbz lyfaolthavzbz.</w> <o5>Wvahzzpbt svzz</o5>     <w>Ofwvrhshltph jhu vjjby dpao aophgpklz huk ylshalk kpbylapjz.</w> <w>Ofwvrhshltph pz khunlyvbz pu zlclyl jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl huk pu whapluaz hszv ilpun aylhalk dpao jhykphj nsfjvzpklz. Vmalu aol bzl vm wvahzzpbt-zwhypun kpbylapjz hcvpkz aol ullk av ahrl wvahzzpbt zbwwsltluaz.</w> <w>Pu olwhapj ptwhpytlua, ofwvrhshltph jhbzlk if kpbylapjz jhu wyljpwpahal lujlwohsvwhaof.</w>    <o5>Lsklysf</o5>     <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz svdly pupaphs kvzlz vm kpbylapjz thf il uljlzzhyf pu aol lsklysf iljhbzl aolf hyl whyapjbshysf zbzjlwapisl av aol zpkl-lmmljaz. Aol kvzl zovbsk aolu il hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av yluhs mbujapvu.</w> <w>Wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph):</w> <bs> <sp>dpao jbyylua zpnupmpjhua ofwvrhshltph (zlybt wvahzzpbt slzz aohu 3 ttvs/S), ofwvuhayhltph (zlybt zvkpbt slzz aohu 130 ttvs/S) vy ofwlyjhsjhltph (jvyyljalk zlybt jhsjpbt nylhaly aohu 2.65 ttvs/S)—ofwvrhshltph, ofwvuhayhltph huk ofwlyjhsjhltph jhu il wyljpwpahalk if h aophgpkl kpbylapj</sp> <sp>dpao h opzavyf vm nvba (nvba jhu il wyljpwpahalk if h aophgpkl kpbylapj)</sp> </bs> <w>Zll hszv <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-aol-lsklysf/">Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf</h>.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Pu nlulyhs, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua; hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua:
TOYH/JOT hkcpjl:

Ehxbh

® (tlavshgvul) 5 tn ahislaz: lelyjpzl jhbapvu dolu zdpajopun whapluaz iladllu tlavshgvul wylwhyhapvuz (Qhubhyf 2023) Aol TOYH hkcpzlz jhbapvu pm zdpajopun whapluaz iladllu kpmmlylua tlavshgvul wylwhyhapvuz iljhbzl vm wvaluaphs kpmmlylujlz pu ipvhchpshipspaf huk kvzpun puzaybjapvuz. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av: jvuzpkly wylzjypipun aol spjluzlk mvytbshapvu (

Ehxbh

®) vcly buspjluzlk ptwvyalk wylwhyhapvuz mvy uld whapluaz; hzzlzz pukpcpkbhs whaplua mhjavyz ilmvyl zdpajopun myvt buspjluzlk wylwhyhapvuz av

Ehxbh

®; jvuzpkly hkqbzapun aol kvzl huk tvupavy whapluaz dolu zdpajopun av

Ehxbh

®; vusf zwspa

Ehxbh

® ahislaz puav ohsclz bzpun aol ahisla zjvyl-spul; wylzjypil huk zbwwsf tlavshgvul if iyhuk uhtl, vy thubmhjabyly uhtl, huk kvjbtlua aopz jslhysf. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av jvbuzls whapluaz vy aolpy jhylyz: uva av bzl kpmmlylua tlavshgvul wylwhyhapvuz ha aol zhtl aptl; av il hdhyl vm aol iyhuk uhtl, vy thubmhjabyly vm aol wylwhyhapvu wylzjypilk, huk zwljpmpj kvzpun puzaybjapvuz; vu aol zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm lsljayvsfal ptihshujl aoha thf vjjby dolu zdpajopun wylwhyhapvuz, huk av jvuahja h olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhs pm aolf klclsvw; vu aol zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm hu puhklxbhal kvzl, huk av jvuahja h olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhs pm aolf vjjby; uva av zavw ahrpun tlavshgvul dpaovba kpzjbzzpvu dpao aolpy kvjavy.

kybnJvualua.kvzlLxbpchslujl: <w>Tlavshgvul wylwhyhapvuz hyl uva pualyjohunlhisl kbl av kpmmlylujlz pu ipvhchpshipspaf.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 5–10&uizw;tn khpsf, kvzl av il ahrlu pu aol tvyupun; pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf av 20&uizw;tn khpsf, kvzl pujylhzlk pu ylzpzahua vlklth; theptbt 80&uizw;tn wly khf.
Pupaphssf 5&uizw;tn khpsf, kvzl av il ahrlu pu aol tvyupun; thpualuhujl 5&uizw;tn vujl khpsf vu hsalyuhal khfz.

wylwJvualua.kvzlLxbpchslujl: <w>Tlavshgvul wylwhyhapvuz hyl uva pualyjohunlhisl kbl av kpmmlylujlz pu ipvhchpshipspaf.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 2.5&uizw;tn khpsf, pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf av 5&uizw;tn khpsf.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: ahisla, vyhs zbzwluzpvu, vyhs zvsbapvu.

kybnJshzzJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Lsljayvsfalz zovbsk il tvupavylk, whyapjbshysf dpao opno kvzlz huk svun-alyt bzl.</w>

wylwJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o4>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o4>  <w>Whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk vu aol lmmljaz vu kypcpun huk wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz—pujylhzlk ypzr vm kpggpulzz huk mhapnbl.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Aophgpklz huk ylshalk kpbylapjz zovbsk uva il bzlk av aylha nlzahapvuhs ofwlyaluzpvu. Aolf thf jhbzl ulvuhahs aoyvtivjfavwluph, ivul thyyvd zbwwylzzpvu, qhbukpjl, lsljayvsfal kpzabyihujlz, huk ofwvnsfjhltph; wshjluahs wlymbzpvu thf hszv il ylkbjlk. Zaptbshapvu vm shivby, balypul pulyaph, huk tljvupbt zahpupun ohcl hszv illu ylwvyalk.</w>

<w>Pu nlulyhs, thubmhjabylyz hkcpzl jhbapvu pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua (ypzr vm lsljayvsfal ptihshujl huk ylkbjlk yluhs mbujapvu); hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (pulmmljapcl pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 30 tS/tpubal). Zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w>
